sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of 3M ( MMM ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 4.9%.
Year to date, 3M registers a 3.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is AT&T ( T ), trading down 2.6%.
AT&T is lower by about 4.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 2.1%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 3.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
